text: NGC 431 is a lenticular galaxy of type SB0 located in the constellation Andromeda. It was discovered on November 22, 1827 by John Herschel. It was described by Dreyer as "faint, small, very suddenly brighter middle." ==References== ==External links== * 0431 18271122 Category:Andromeda (constellation) Category:Lenticular galaxies
title: NGC 431
